amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent section 2 of the bill from applying to rules related to protecting air and water quality.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-174 to prevent Sec. 2 of the bill from applying to rules related to protecting air and water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 224 (Roll no. 429).
